name: Wellp
description:
A small island and a well...

Playlist to play along:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLW6vF0T12eZYjzI43tyE3QI1wuF5UP9mW

Decorate and chill around in this virtual toy!

 It was meant to be a chill experience, you decorate and get new customization items from the well from time to time.

This jam version has already everything unlocked and you can play with some elements to customize the island and make some cool compositions, dont forget to take a screen!!

Controls

Drag elements by clicking on them - Long press if they are already placed on the island, you can rotate the elements with the scroll wheel, and erase them with right click.

Drag the island to rotate it and observe it from new angles!

Smoll button on the left is for the photo mode, the small one on the right is to clear the island.

You can zoom in using the scroll wheel in photo mode, escape to get out of that mode.

Known bugs

Don't quit the game while being in one of the customization menus! plz!

Tools used

The grass was made using 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/brute-force-grass-shader-19238...

I also used Shapes: 
https://acegikmo.com/shapes/

Save Game Free:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/input-management/save-game-free-gold...

and that famous vaporwave bust 
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/helios-vaporwave-bust-f7a0fdfc6bef44b497e3325765...
